title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister of State at the Department of Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department housing local government heritage) order 2023

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 2. Hannah Hamilton, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Hannah Hamilton, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to Malcolm Noonan, Minister of State at the 
Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage, with effect from 21 
December 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

21 March, 2023. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Tánaiste. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [134] 3
